name: MetroStatus
0: ”Alexa ask Metro Status are there any disruptions?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: metro status
des: Find out about any delays on the Tyne and Wear Metro before you start your journey. With this skill you can find out about current and ongoing disruptions, as well as getting the heads up about upcoming works and timetable changes. Information supplied by Nexus and Traveline. This skill is not an official Nexus skill and the author is in no way responsible for the late running of any trains.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
